body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Andrew Rivera and the customer's name is Cynthia Kelly.  The conversation is about the (a Food Truck ) and is a conversation about security.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Andrew Rivera and I am with SecureFood Trucks. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Andrew. My name is Cynthia Kelly, and I have some questions about security for my food truck.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Cynthia! I’d be happy to help you with your security concerns. What specific aspects are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I want to make sure my food truck is safe at night and that I have protection against theft.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's a great concern, Cynthia. We offer various security solutions, including GPS tracking and surveillance cameras. May I have your zip code to assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one zero two zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your phone number for follow-up communications?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three zero three - four five six - seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Cynthia! I’ll make sure to send all the information to that number. Do you have any other questions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not right now, but I appreciate your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Cynthia. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
